mapper.sql: DISTRIBUTE_ID, DISTRIBUTE_TIME, APPLY_ID, DISTRIBUTE_REMARK, USER_ID, user_id2, type
mapper.insert: insert into ams_archdistribute (DISTRIBUTE_ID, DISTRIBUTE_TIME, APPLY_ID, DISTRIBUTE_REMARK, USER_ID, user_id2, type) values (#{distributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distributeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{distributeRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{userId2,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into ams_archdistribute
DISTRIBUTE_TIME,
APPLY_ID,

user_id2,
type,

mapper.update:
update ams_archdistribute
DISTRIBUTE_TIME = #{distributeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
APPLY_ID = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
DISTRIBUTE_REMARK = #{distributeRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR},
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR},
user_id2 = #{userId2,jdbcType=CHAR},
type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where DISTRIBUTE_ID = #{distributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ams_archdistribute set DISTRIBUTE_TIME = #{distributeTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, APPLY_ID = #{applyId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, DISTRIBUTE_REMARK = #{distributeRemark,jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}, user_id2 = #{userId2,jdbcType=CHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=INTEGER} where DISTRIBUTE_ID = #{distributeId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select ar.*,co.coungt from ( select a.*,sy1.NAME as name2 from ( select ar.*,sy.NAME as name from ams_archdistribute ar left join sys_user sy on sy.USER_ID= ar.USER_ID) a left join sys_user sy1 on a.user_id2=sy1.USER_ID ) ar join ( select DISTRIBUTE_ID ,count(1) as coungt from ams_archdistribute_file group by DISTRIBUTE_ID) co on ar.DISTRIBUTE_ID=co.DISTRIBUTE_ID
